Articles.Content:
just installed the new version and i don't like it for one reason.

my old ships, i mean, ships that i made in the last version are not working as good as before.

what did they change, physics, thrust, or is it some kind of bug?

There weren't a lot of changes that would affect ship design in the switch from 0.23.5 to 0.24.x. The biggest negative change is that the LFB engine/tank combination had its efficiency reduced significantly; if your rockets use this engine a lot they could very well suffer from greater fuel consumption.

What do you mean by new version? I ran to check if .25 is out. Gossips spreads that it will be released in a week or so.

Yea there were much rebalancing in .24. You can search the forum for the older threads. There were plenty similar complains.
We'll need more info than 'it doens't work'

New version working fine here.

Did you tried a clean reinstall ?

There were quite a few minor changes in 0.24 that re-balanced things, especially costs, with the new contracts in mind. Mainsails were improved and other components adjusted but only one of the 35-odd vehicles in my tutorial needed any change at all (a bit more fuel). What problems are you having exactly and, most importantly, what mods are you using?
